title: Chicken with red wine & shallot sauce

ingredients.item: 300g pack essential Waitrose British Chicken 2 Breast Fillets
200g Waitrose Red Wine And Shallot Sauce

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200ÂºC, gas mark 6. Blanch the carrots in boiling water for 4 minutes, drain and add to a small roasting tin. Add the chicken, shallots and sauce. Roast for 30-35 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through with no pink meat.
Heat the mashed potato according to pack instructions and serve with the chicken.
